item.title: By: Open Hardware Summit Schedule, Breakout sessions and Tickets! « adafruit industries blog
item.dc:creator: Open Hardware Summit Schedule, Breakout sessions and Tickets! « adafruit industries blog
item.description: [...] Breakouts: This year we have breakout sessions in the afternoon. You will be asked to select which one you want to attend before completing your ticket purchase. Your selection will be used to assign rooms at the venue and plan the session, so please consider it final. Descriptions and details about each breakout session can be found at www.openhardwaresummit.org/breakouts [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Breakouts: This year we have breakout sessions in the afternoon. You will be asked to select which one you want to attend before completing your ticket purchase. Your selection will be used to assign rooms at the venue and plan the session, so please consider it final. Descriptions and details about each breakout session can be found at http://www.openhardwaresummit.org/breakouts […]
